upgrade-shinobi-3.name: 城堡时代忍者
upgrade-shinobi-3.description: Increases the health and damage of Shinobi when reaching Castle Age.

upgrade-shinobi-4.name: 帝国时代忍者
upgrade-shinobi-4.description: Increases the health and damage of of Shinobi when reaching Imperial Age.

yaki-ire.name: 淬火
yaki-ire.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

zen.name: 禅宗
zen.description: Buddhist Monks generate 25 gold every 60 seconds.

companion-equipment.name: 同伴装备
companion-equipment.description: Increase Jeanne d'Arc's health and damage by 25% and gain +1 armor. Increase the health and damage of Jeanne's Companions by 20%.

level-2-path-of-the-archer.name: 射手之路
level-2-path-of-the-archer.description:
Level 2 option

Jeanne chooses the path of the Archer, equipping a bow to engage foes from afar.
Gains the Divine Arrow ability, which deals high damage to a single target.

Requires 500XP

level-2-path-of-the-warrior.name: 战士之路
level-2-path-of-the-warrior.description:
Level 2 option

Jeanne chooses the path of the Warrior, equipping a two handed sword to engage foes in close combat.
Gains the Holy Wrath ability, which deals area of effect damage around Jeanne.

Requires 500XP

level-3-champion-companions.name: 冠军剑士同伴
level-3-champion-companions.description:
Level 3 option

Jeanne's Champions become available to train at Keeps.
Gains "To Arms, Men!", which rallies 3 Champions to her side.

Requires 500XP

level-3-rider-companions.name: 骑兵同伴
level-3-rider-companions.description:
Level 3 option

Jeanne's Riders become available to train at Keeps.
Gains "Riders, Ready!", which rallies 3 Riders to her side.

Requires 500XP

level-4-field-commander.name: 战地指挥官
level-4-field-commander.description:
Level 4 option

Jeanne's Rally Call ability will now call 7 of her chosen companions onto the Battlefield.
Gains the Strength of Heaven ultimate ability, which greatly empowers a single unit.

Requires 500XP

level-4-gunpowder-monarch.name: 火药君主
level-4-gunpowder-monarch.description:
Level 4 option

Jeanne's Rally Call ability will now call 3 of her chosen companions and a powerful Cannon onto the Battlefield.
Gains the Valorous Inspiration ultimate ability, which greatly increases the attack speed of nearby allies.

Requires 500XP

ordinance-company.name: 圣令连队
ordinance-company.description: Consecrated buildings also reduce the Wood and Gold cost of units by 25%.

canoe-tactics.name: 独木舟战术
canoe-tactics.description: Archer Ships fire an additional 2 Javelin weapons.

farima-leadership.name: 法里玛领导制
farima-leadership.description: Sofa increase the movement speed of nearby infantry by +15%.

javelin-emplacement.name: 标枪槽
javelin-emplacement.description: Add defensive javelin to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Javelins deal additional damage to ranged units. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.

local-knowledge.name: 本地知识
local-knowledge.description: Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain +5 healing with each attack for 5 seconds after coming out of stealth.

mounted-guns.name: 舰载炮
mounted-guns.description: Replaces Springald Ship weaponry with Cannons which provide greater range and damage.

poisoned-arrows.name: 毒箭
poisoned-arrows.description: Archer arrows deal an additional 3 damage over 6 seconds.

precision-training.name: 精准训练
precision-training.description: Increase ranged damage of Donso by +6, Archers by +2, and Javelin Throwers by +3.

additional-torches.name: 更多火炬
additional-torches.description: Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +3.

additional-torches-improved.name: 更多火炬(已强化)
additional-torches-improved.description:
Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +5.
If Additional Torches has already been researched, increase the torch damage from all infantry and cavalry by +2.

biology-improved.name: 生物学(已强化)
biology-improved.description:
Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +40%.
If Biology has already been researched, increase it by +10% instead.

crosscut-saw-improved.name: 横切锯(已强化)
crosscut-saw-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5% and Wood gatherers carry capacity by +5.
If Crosscut Saw has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

cupellation-improved.name: 灰吹法(已强化)
cupellation-improved.description:
Gold gatherers drop off 22.5% more resources.
If Cupellation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

double-broadax-improved.name: 双阔斧(已强化)
double-broadax-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5%.
If Double Broadax has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

elite-army-tactics-improved.name: 精锐军队战术(已强化)
elite-army-tactics-improved.description:
Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +30% damage and +6 melee armor.
If Elite Army Tactics has already been researched, increases damage by +10% and melee armor by +2 instead.

fertilization-improved.name: 施肥(已强化)
fertilization-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Fertilization has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

forestry-improved.name: 林业(已强化)
forestry-improved.description: Villagers fell trees in a single chop.

geometry-improved.name: 几何学(已强化)
geometry-improved.description:
Increase damage of Trebuchets by +30%.
If Geometry has already been researched, increase their damage by +10% instead.

greased-axles-improved.name: 润滑轮轴(已强化)
greased-axles-improved.description:
Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +20%.
If Greased Axles has already been researched, increase it by +5% instead.

herbal-medicine-improved.name: 草药(已强化)
herbal-medicine-improved.description:
Increase the healing rate of religious units by +90%.
If Herbal Medicine has already been researched, increase it by +30% instead.

horticulture-improved.name: 园艺学(已强化)
horticulture-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Horticulture has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

lightweight-beams-improved.name: 轻质横梁(已强化)
lightweight-beams-improved.description:
Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +30% and reduce their field construction time by -75%.
If Lightweight Beams has already been researched, increase attack speed by +10% and reduce field construction time by -25% instead.

lumber-preservation-improved.name: 木材保存(已强化)
lumber-preservation-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5%.
If Lumber Preservation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

military-academy-improved.name: 攻城工程学(已强化)
military-academy-improved.description:
Increase the production speed of military and transport units at buildings by 53%.
Does not affect religious or other support units.
If Military Academy has already been researched, increase production speed by 20% instead.

monastic-shrines.name: 僧侣祭坛
monastic-shrines.description: Prayer Tents allow Improved Production within their influence even without an Ovoo.

pax-mongolica.name: 蒙古和平
pax-mongolica.description: Add +300 health and +3 fire armor to all Outposts.

piety-improved.name: 虔诚(已强化)
piety-improved.description:
Increase all Shamans' health by +60.
If Piety has already been researched, increase it by +20 instead.

piracy.name: 海盗行为
piracy.description: Gain +25 Wood and +25 Gold when sinking an enemy ship.

precision-cross-breeding-improved.name: 精准杂交育种(已强化)
precision-cross-breeding-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Precision Cross-Breeding has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

professional-scouts-improved.name: 专业侦察兵(已强化)
professional-scouts-improved.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +200% damage against wild animals. Scouts move -35% slower while carrying a carcass and cannot pick up Boar.
If Professional Scouts has already been researched, increase damage by +100% instead.

raid-bounty.name: 突袭赏金
raid-bounty.description: Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +50 Food and Gold.

raid-bounty-improved.name: 突袭赏金(已强化)
raid-bounty-improved.description:
Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +75 Food and Gold.
If Raid Bounty has already been researched, increase the raid income for igniting a building by +25 Food and Gold.

roller-shutter-triggers-improved.name: 卷帘式触发器(已强化)
roller-shutter-triggers-improved.description:
Increases Springald attack speed by +35% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.
If Roller Shutter Triggers has already been researched, increase by 10% instead.

shaft-mining-improved.name: 竖井开采(已强化)
shaft-mining-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 22.5%.
If Acid Distillation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

siege-engineering-improved.name: 军事学院(已强化)
siege-engineering-improved.description: Melee and ranged infantry can construct Siege Towers and Battering Rams in the field. Improved Siege Engineering allows for the construction of Mangonels, Springalds and Trebuchets as well.

siege-works-improved.name: 攻城武器(已强化)
siege-works-improved.description:
New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege engines by +30%.
If Siege Works has already been researched, increase their health by +10% instead.

siha-bow-limbs.name: 西哈弓臂
siha-bow-limbs.description: Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.

siha-bow-limbs-improved.name: 西哈弓臂(已强化)
siha-bow-limbs-improved.description:
Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +2.
If Siha Bow Limbs has already been researched, increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.

specialized-pick-improved.name: 特制矿锄(已强化)
specialized-pick-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 22.5%.
If Specialized Pick has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

steppe-lancers.name: 草原长矛骑兵
steppe-lancers.description: Increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.

steppe-lancers-improved.name: 草原长矛骑兵(已强化)
steppe-lancers-improved.description:
Increase Keshik healing by +2 Health per attack and attack speed by +20%.
If Steppe Lancers has already been researched, increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.

stone-bounty.name: 石料赏金
stone-bounty.description: Add +50 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.

stone-bounty-improved.name: 石料商业(已强化)
stone-bounty-improved.description:
Add +75 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.
If Stone Bounty has already been researched, add +25 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.

stone-commerce.name: 石料商业
stone-commerce.description: Traders supply +10% Stone to their trades.

stone-commerce-improved.name: 石料商业(已强化)
stone-commerce-improved.description:
Traders supply +20% Stone to their trades.
If Stone Commerce has already been researched, supply +10% Stone instead.

superior-mobility.name: 卓越机动性
superior-mobility.description: Packed buildings move and pack/unpack 50% faster.

superior-mobility-improved.name: 卓越机动性(已强化)
superior-mobility-improved.description:
Packed buildings move +70% faster and pack/unpack +50% faster.
If Superior Mobility has already been researched, increase speed by +20% instead.

survival-techniques-improved.name: 生存技术(已强化)
survival-techniques-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +20%.
If Survival Techniques has already been researched, increase hunted meat gather rate by +5% instead.

textiles-improved.name: 纺织品(已强化)
textiles-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
If Textiles has already been researched, increase health by +100% instead.

tithe-barns-improved.name: 什一税仓库(已强化)
tithe-barns-improved.description:
Relics placed in a Prayer Tent provide an income of +60 Food, +60 Wood, and +15 Stone every minute.
If Tithe Barns has already been researched, increase the income of Food and Wood by +20 and Stone by +5 instead.

wheelbarrow-improved.name: 独轮推车(已强化)
wheelbarrow-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' resource carry capacity by +9 and movement speed by +15%.
If Wheelbarrow has already been researched, increase carry capacity by +4 instead.

whistling-arrows.name: 镝矢
whistling-arrows.description: Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +5 seconds and range by +2 tiles.

whistling-arrows-improved.name: 镝矢(已强化)
whistling-arrows-improved.description:
Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +7 seconds and range by +3 tiles.
If Whistling Arrows has already been researched, increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +2 seconds and range by +1 tile.

yam-network.name: 驿站网络
yam-network.description: Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.

yam-network-improved.name: 驿站网络(已强化)
yam-network-improved.description:
Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.
Improved Yam Network allows Traders to regenerate 1 health every 2 seconds while in Yam's aura.

bodkin-bolts.name: 锥状弩箭
bodkin-bolts.description: Gilded Crossbowmen deal +20 damage against Siege units.

golden-cuirass.name: 黄金胸甲
golden-cuirass.description: Gilded Men-at-Arms who fall below 30% health take -20% damage.

heavy-torches.name: 重型火炬
heavy-torches.description: Gilded Spearman torches deal area of effect damage.

scale-armor.name: 鳞甲
scale-armor.description: Increase the ranged armor of Gilded Archers by +3.

war-horses.name: 战马
war-horses.description: Gilded Knights take -25% damage while charging.

zornhau.name: 怒击
zornhau.description:
Gilded Landsknecht equip a halberd weapon that wounds enemies. When struck by this weapon, a unit will bleed for 2 damage every second. Lasts 10 seconds.
Any healing effect will remove the bleed.

advanced-academy.name: 高级学院
advanced-academy.description: Increases military production speed by +25% and outfits Military Schools with the ability to train Lancers and Janissaries.

anatolian-hills.name: 安纳托利亚山丘
anatolian-hills.description: Spawn 10 sheep at the Landmark Town Center and increase Villager mining speed by +15%.

field-work.name: 外勤任务
field-work.description: Spawn 2 Imams at the Landmark Town Center. Imams area heal nearby units for 1 health every second. Increases to 2 health in Castle Age and 3 health in Imperial Age.

great-bombard-emplacement.name: 大型手推炮炮台
great-bombard-emplacement.description: Add a defensive Great Bombard emplacement to this structure.

imperial-fleet.name: 帝国舰队
imperial-fleet.description: Increase the production speed of Gunpowder Ships by 25% and their movement speed by 25%.

janissary-company.name: 苏丹亲兵连队
janissary-company.description: Spawn 2 Janissaries for each of your Landmark Town Center and Military Schools at the Landmark Town Center.

mehter-drums.name: 奥斯曼军乐队战鼓
mehter-drums.description: Spawn 1 Mehter at the Landmark Town Center. Mehters increase move speed to units in the same formation by +15%.

military-campus.name: 军事学校
military-campus.description: Increase Military Schools that can be built by +1.

siege-crews.name: 攻城人员
siege-crews.description: Allows all siege engines to be garrisoned by infantry. While garrisoned, attack and setup speed is increased by +25%.

trade-bags.name: 交易袋
trade-bags.description: Increase the amount of Gold Traders collect and Income from the Sultanhani Trade Network by +40%.

adaptable-hulls.name: 适应性强的船身
adaptable-hulls.description: Converting between Lodya Ship types is 50% faster and no longer has a cost penalty.

banded-arms.name: 钢带臂
banded-arms.description: Increase the range of Springalds by +1 tiles.

boyars-fortitude.name: 贵族铁骑的坚毅
boyars-fortitude.description: Increase the health of Rus cavalry by +25.

castle-turret.name: 城堡炮塔
castle-turret.description: Increase the damage of arrows fired from this Wooden Fortress by +2.

castle-watch.name: 城堡瞭望台
castle-watch.description: Increase the sight range of this Wooden Fortress by 6 tiles.

divine-light.name: 神圣之光
divine-light.description: Increase the duration of Saint's Blessing by +10 seconds.

fervor.name: 狂热
fervor.description: Improve the range of Saint's Blessing by +5 tiles and the damage granted by Saint's Blessing by +1.

fine-tuned-guns.name: 精密枪械
fine-tuned-guns.description: Increase damage of Bombards by +20%. Bombards gain +50% damage vs Infantry.

knight-poleaxes.name: 骑士长柄斧
knight-poleaxes.description: Knights equip a poleax, increasing their melee damage by +4.

mounted-training.name: 骑射培训
mounted-training.description:
Increase weapon range of Horse Archers by +1 and unlock the Gallop ability.
Gallop: Activate to move at maximum speed with +2 tile weapon range for 8 seconds.

saints-veneration.name: 圣人的崇拜
saints-veneration.description: Increase the health of Warrior Monks by +100.

siege-crew-training.name: 攻城人员训练
siege-crew-training.description: Setup and teardown speed of Mangonels, Trebuchets, and Bombards is instant.

upgrade-miltia-3.name: 城堡时代民兵
upgrade-miltia-3.description: Increases the health, attack and armor of Militia when reaching Castle Age.

upgrade-militia-4.name: 帝国时代民兵
upgrade-militia-4.description: Increases the health, attack and armor of Militia when reaching Imperial Age.

wandering-town.name: 漂泊城镇
wandering-town.description: Ram damage increased by +25%. Rams heal 2 health every 1 second.

10000-bolts.name: 万弩箭
10000-bolts.description: Zhuge Nu and Crossbowmen fire an extra bolt. The additional bolt for Crossbowmen is 40% as effective as the previous bolt.

advanced-administration.name: 高级管理
advanced-administration.description: Imperial Officials gain 150 health and their maximum Gold carried is increased by +80. Imperial Official limit increased by +2.

bolt-magazines.name: 弩箭匣
bolt-magazines.description: More advanced magazines allow Zhuge Nu to fire piercing bolts with +0.5 range that deal +1 damage against Light Melee Infantry.

cloud-of-terror.name: 恐怖之云
cloud-of-terror.description: Adds area of effect damage to Bombards.

dali-horses.name: 大理马
dali-horses.description: Increase the attack speed of Cavalry units by +20%.

dynastic-protectors.name: 王朝守护者
dynastic-protectors.description: Allows production of unique cavalry units, the Imperial Guard, and the Yuan Raider.

hard-cased-bombs.name: 硬壳炸弹
hard-cased-bombs.description: Units receive +15% Ranged and Melee damage for 5 seconds when hit by a Grenade.

imperial-red-seals.name: 帝王红玺
imperial-red-seals.description: Imperial Official limit increased by +2. Grants an Imperial Official upon completion.

military-affairs-bureau.name: 枢密院
military-affairs-bureau.description: Imperial Officials can now supervise Keeps and Outposts to reduce damage taken by 35%.

regional-inspection.name: 地方巡查
regional-inspection.description: Supervision by Imperial Officials improved from 150% to 300%.

roar-of-the-dragon.name: 龙之咆哮
roar-of-the-dragon.description: Spearmen and Horsemen gain a Fire Lance when charging.

blacksmith.name: 铁匠铺
blacksmith.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.

capital-town-center.name: 首都城市中心
capital-town-center.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

dock.name: 码头
dock.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

farm.name: 农田
farm.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

house-of-wisdom.name: 智慧宫
house-of-wisdom.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Ayyubid Dynasty.
Ayyubids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.
Wing bonuses improve based on the Age they were built.

keep.name: 城堡
keep.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

lumber-camp.name: 伐木场
lumber-camp.description: Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.

madrasa.name: 穆斯林学塾
madrasa.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.

market.name: 市场
market.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader.

mill.name: 磨坊
mill.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.

mining-camp.name: 采矿场
mining-camp.description: Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.

mosque.name: 清真寺
mosque.description: Produces Scholars. The first Mosque constructed provides a Scholar. Starting in the Castle Age (III), Scholars can deposit Relics in this building to generate Gold.

outpost.name: 哨站
outpost.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.

palisade-gate.name: 木城门
palisade-gate.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.

palisade-wall.name: 木栅栏
palisade-wall.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

prayer-hall-of-uqba.name: 奥卡巴礼拜大殿
prayer-hall-of-uqba.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

siege-workshop.name: 攻城武器厂
siege-workshop.description: Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.

stone-wall.name: 石墙
stone-wall.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +2.

stone-wall-gate.name: 石墙城门
stone-wall-gate.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

stone-wall-tower.name: 石墙塔
stone-wall-tower.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.

town-center.name: 城镇中心
town-center.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.

aqueduct.name: 水渠
aqueduct.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

cathedral-of-divine-wisdom.name: 圣慧大教堂
cathedral-of-divine-wisdom.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

cistern.name: 水池
cistern.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura. Cistern costs increase the more Cisterns are built.

cistern-of-the-first-hill.name: 地下水宫
cistern-of-the-first-hill.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.

foreign-engineering-company.name: 外国工程公司
foreign-engineering-company.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Hui Hui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.

golden-horn-tower.name: 金角湾塔
golden-horn-tower.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.

grand-winery.name: 大酒庄
grand-winery.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.

imperial-hippodrome.name: 帝国竞技场
imperial-hippodrome.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 25 seconds. Earn more points by killing enemy units.

mercenary-house.name: 雇佣兵之家
mercenary-house.description:
Produces Mercenary units for Olive Oil after purchasing a Mercenary Contract. One contract can be purchased.
Unlock another set of Mercenaries with +50% production speed by placing this building near a Trade Post.

monastery.name: 修道院
monastery.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

olive-grove.name: 橄榄树林
olive-grove.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Olive Grove.
Only one Villager can work each Olive Grove.
Byzantine Villagers gather Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered.

palatine-school.name: 贵族学校
palatine-school.description: When training Limitanei, Varangian Guards, Cataphracts, or Cheirosiphons there is a 30% chance to also spawn one at this Landmark.

university.name: 大学
university.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.

astronomical-clocktower.name: 天文钟楼
astronomical-clocktower.description: Acts as a Siege Workshop and produces siege engines with +50% health.

barbican-of-the-sun.name: 烈日瓮城
barbican-of-the-sun.description:
Fires a long range hand cannon and adds arrowslits while garrisoned. Can be upgraded with weaponry and offers vision into Stealth Forests. 
Imperial Officials can drop off taxes at this building.

enclave-of-the-emperor.name: 帝王飞地
enclave-of-the-emperor.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

granary.name: 谷仓
granary.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Improves the Farm gather rate of nearby Villagers by +10% (stacks with other Granaries). Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

great-wall-gatehouse.name: 长城门楼
great-wall-gatehouse.description:
Must be built over Stone Walls.
Comes with a Nest of Bees emplacement and provides +25% ranged damage to all units on walls.

imperial-academy.name: 翰林院
imperial-academy.description: Nearby buildings generate 100% more Gold from taxes. Imperial Officials produced here cost 30% less resources and can drop off taxes at this building.

imperial-palace.name: 皇宫
imperial-palace.description:
A spy Landmark with 28 tile sight radius and the Imperial Spies ability. Activate to view location of enemy workers for 15 seconds.
Imperial Officials can drop off taxes at this building.

pagoda.name: 宝塔
pagoda.description: Religious units can pick up Relics and place them in the Pagoda to generate +100 Gold, +62 Food, +62 Wood, and +25 Stone every 60 seconds.

spirit-way.name: 皇陵
spirit-way.description:
Dynasty technology can be researched here for -50% cost and +150% research speed. When a dynasty unit is killed, nearby units receive +20% attack speed and +20 health over 10 seconds.
Imperial Officials can drop off taxes at this building.

compound-of-the-defender.name: 守护者大院
compound-of-the-defender.description:
Infantry units can build Stone Walls, Gates, and Towers. Reduces Stone cost of buildings and their emplacements by 20%.
Contains defensive technologies that ignore building and Imperial Age (IV) requirements.

dome-of-the-faith.name: 信仰穹顶建筑
dome-of-the-faith.description: Acts as a Mosque. Produce Scholars at a discount of 65 Gold.

great-palace-of-agra.name: 阿格拉大宫殿
great-palace-of-agra.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

hisar-academy.name: 希萨尔学院
hisar-academy.description:
Acts as Madrasa. Generates +12 Food per minute based on the number of technologies researched. Does not apply to emplacements.
Grants 3 free Scholars upon completion.

house-of-learning.name: 学苑
house-of-learning.description: Grants no immediate bonus other than advancing to the next Age, but contains many unique technologies.

palace-of-the-sultan.name: 苏丹宫殿
palace-of-the-sultan.description: Automatically produces Sultan's Elite Tower Elephants. Garrison up to 4 Scholars in the Landmark to increase production speed.

tower-of-victory.name: 胜利之塔
tower-of-victory.description: Enables Tower of Victory, Mosques, and Madrasas to increase the attack speed of infantry by +20% when produced within their influence.

abbey-of-kings.name: 列王修道院
abbey-of-kings.description: Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every 1 seconds. May also Crown a King, a powerful cavalry leader with a healing aura. Queues production of a free King upon completion.

berkshire-palace.name: 伯克郡宫殿
berkshire-palace.description: Acts as a Keep with increased health and powerful incendiary arrows. All weapons have 14.5 tiles of range.

cathedral-of-st-thomas.name: 圣汤马斯大教堂
cathedral-of-st-thomas.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

council-hall.name: 议会厅
council-hall.description: Acts as an Archery Range with all units and technologies. Works +100% faster.

kings-palace.name: 王宫
kings-palace.description: Acts as a Town Center with all the behaviors, technology, units, and bonuses.

the-white-tower.name: 白塔
the-white-tower.description: Acts as a Keep with all the behaviors, technologies, and bonuses. Works 75% faster.

wynguard-palace.name: 温嘉德宫殿
wynguard-palace.description: Allows production of 4 battalions: Wynguard Army, Wynguard Rangers, Wynguard Raiders, and Wynguard Footmen.

chamber-of-commerce.name: 商会
chamber-of-commerce.description: Acts as a Market. Trains one free Trader for each economic technology researched.

college-of-artillery.name: 炮兵学院
college-of-artillery.description:
Produces the Royal Artillery versions of the Cannon, Ribauldequin, and Culverin, which do +30% more damage.
Unlocks the Artillery ability for Cannons trained from the College of Artillery.
Contains Siege and Gunpowder Technologies, trains units and researches technologies 50% faster.

guild-hall.name: 公会大厅
guild-hall.description: Generates and stores resources over time, the more resources stored the faster they are generated. Select between Food, Wood, Stone, or Gold. Generates stone at half the rate.

notre-dame.name: 圣母院
notre-dame.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

red-palace.name: 红宫
red-palace.description:
Acts as a Keep. Features high-damage arbalest emplacements. Each garrisoned unit adds an additional arbalest.
Activates an Arbalest emplacement on all Keeps and Town Centers.

royal-institute.name: 皇家学院
royal-institute.description: Houses all technologies unique to the French. Research is -30% cheaper here and ignores Age requirements.

school-of-cavalry.name: 骑兵学校
school-of-cavalry.description: Acts as a Stable. All of your stables produce units +20% faster.

aachen-chapel.name: 亚琛教堂
aachen-chapel.description:
Inspires units in a large radius so long as a Prelate is garrisoned.
Acts as a drop-off point for all resource types.

burgrave-palace.name: 城主宫殿
burgrave-palace.description: Acts as a Barracks that produces 400% faster.

elzbach-palace.name: 埃尔茨巴赫宫殿
elzbach-palace.description: Acts as a Keep with +50% health. All buildings within influence take -33% less damage.

great-palace-of-flensburg.name: 弗伦斯堡大宫殿
great-palace-of-flensburg.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

meinwerk-palace.name: 迈因维克宫殿
meinwerk-palace.description: Acts like a Blacksmith. Technology researched here costs -50% and researches 50% faster. Contains Technologies unique to this Landmark.

palace-of-swabia.name: 施瓦本宫殿
palace-of-swabia.description:
Acts as a Town Center. Produces Villagers +200% faster and at -66% cost.
Cost to build this Landmark is reduced by -20%.

regnitz-cathedral.name: 雷格尼茨大教堂
regnitz-cathedral.description: Acts as a Monastery. All Relics generate +100% gold while garrisoned.

buddhist-temple.name: 佛寺
buddhist-temple.description: Produces the Buddhist Monk and houses Unique Buddhist technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

castle.name: 城堡
castle.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position equipped with a powerful Rocket, which deals high damage to a single target. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

castle-of-the-crow.name: 乌鸦城堡
castle-of-the-crow.description: Acts as a Castle. Can periodically spawn Treasure Caravans from selected neutral Trading Posts to provide a large amount of Food, Wood, Gold, and some Stone when reaching the Castle of the Crow.

farmhouse.name: 农舍
farmhouse.description: Increases your maximum Population and Villagers can drop-off Food at this building. Contains technologies to improve Food gathering.

floating-gate.name: 水上鸟居
floating-gate.description:
Produces a Shinto Priest carrying a Yorishiro every 2 minutes. The first priest spawns instantly. Deposit up to 4 Yorishiro in buildings to provide unique bonuses.
 
Unlocks Shinto Shrines, which contains unique Shinto technologies and produces Shinto Priests.

forge.name: 锻造厂
forge.description: Villagers can drop-off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining and military units.

koka-township.name: 甲贺城镇
koka-township.description: Can produce Shinobi espionage units which specialize in scouting, sabotage, and assassination. Queues production of a free Shinobi upon completion.

kura-storehouse.name: 藏造仓库
kura-storehouse.description: Universal drop-off location that creates a Farm around the Landmark every 50 seconds — generates Wood instead when farmland becomes full.

shinto-shrine.name: 神社
shinto-shrine.description: Produces the Shinto Priest and houses Unique Shinto technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

tanegashima-gunsmith.name: 种子岛枪匠
tanegashima-gunsmith.description: Stockpiles weapon supplies every 30 seconds that can be used to instantly produce gunpowder units - comes with 2 stockpiles. Produces Ozutsu, a unique heavy ranged gunpowder infantry with siege damage. Allows access to Ribauldequins.

temple-of-equality.name: 平等院
temple-of-equality.description:
Produces Buddhist Monks and contains unique Buddhist technologies. Buddhist Monks provide support in combat by decreasing enemy damage with Sohei's Sutra and by enhancing damage of allies with Buddhist Conversion.
 
Also allows construction of 4 additional Buddhist Temples.

tokugawa-shrine.name: 德川神社
tokugawa-shrine.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

cattle-ranch.name: 养牛场
cattle-ranch.description: Cattle garrisoned in this ranch generate +25 Food per minute. This value is increased by the food upgrades.

farimba-garrison.name: 死士驻军
farimba-garrison.description: Enlist one of three units to enhance your roster: the Mansa Musofadi, Mansa Javelineer, or Freeborn Warrior. Another unit can be enlisted in the Imperial Age.

fort-of-the-huntress.name: 女猎手要塞
fort-of-the-huntress.description:
Acts as a Keep that shoots poison arrows. Infantry units nearby the Landmark enter Stealth for 30 seconds.
Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain First Strike, dealing more damage when breaking Stealth with an attack.

grand-fulani-corral.name: 富拉尼大围栏
grand-fulani-corral.description: Nearby cattle provide 20 Food per minute.

great-mosque.name: 大清真寺
great-mosque.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

griot-bara.name: 说书人巴拉鼓
griot-bara.description: Begin a festival for 300 Gold, providing global enhancements to Food gather rates, unit production speeds, or damage of torches and siege attacks. One festival may be active at a time.

mansa-quarry.name: 皇家采石场
mansa-quarry.description: Generates 75 Gold per minute. Can be toggled to generate Stone instead.

pit-mine.name: 露天矿区
pit-mine.description:
Must be built on a Gold Vein.
Mines 35 Gold per minute without depleting the deposit. If a deposit has been depleted, the Pit Mine can be re-placed on exhausted Gold Veins.

saharan-trade-network.name: 撒哈拉贸易网络
saharan-trade-network.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Javelin Emplacement researched. Unlocks Javelin Emplacement for Outposts.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.

toll-outpost.name: 收费哨站
toll-outpost.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 8% of their carried Gold. Does not generate any bonus tax if a toll outpost is built within range of another one.

deer-stones.name: 鹿石
deer-stones.description:
Deer Stones grant access to the Khan's Hunter at the Archery Range.
Instantly researches the Yam Network technology.

ger.name: 蒙古包
ger.description:
Villagers can drop off Food, Wood, and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve resource gathering.
Stone is gathered through Ovoos.

khaganate-palace.name: 汗国宫殿
khaganate-palace.description: Automatically spawns diverse armies from across the Mongol Empire and its dominions.

kurultai.name: 忽里勒台
kurultai.description: Nearby units within its aura heal +1 health every 1 second and gain an additional +20% damage.

monument-of-the-great-khan.name: 大汗纪念碑
monument-of-the-great-khan.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

ovoo.name: 敖包
ovoo.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 70/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.

pasture.name: 牧场
pasture.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 140 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.

prayer-tent.name: 祈祷帐篷
prayer-tent.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

steppe-redoubt.name: 草原防卫据点
steppe-redoubt.description: Acts as a Ger. Gold dropped off at this Landmark is increased by +50%.

the-silver-tree.name: 银之树
the-silver-tree.description: Acts as a Market. Production speed of Traders increased by +40% with a -40% reduced Gold cost.

the-white-stupa.name: 白色浮屠佛塔
the-white-stupa.description: Acts as an Ovoo and produces 240 Stone per minute without a Stone Outcropping.

azure-mosque.name: 蓝色清真寺
azure-mosque.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

istanbul-imperial-palace.name: 伊斯坦布尔皇宫
istanbul-imperial-palace.description: Double the Imperial Council experience around the Landmark and increase the Vizier Point limit by +3.

istanbul-observatory.name: 伊斯坦布尔天文台
istanbul-observatory.description: Acts as a University. Improves the influence provided by the University and Blacksmith and production speed of the Grand Galley to +100%.

mehmed-imperial-armory.name: 穆罕默德帝国军械库
mehmed-imperial-armory.description: Produces siege engines for free but with a longer train time.

military-school.name: 军事学校
military-school.description: The Military School can be assigned to produce one type of unit continuously at no cost, however they are produced at a slower rate.

sea-gate-castle.name: 海门城堡
sea-gate-castle.description: Acts as a Keep with a free Great Bombard emplacement. All Keeps gain an aura that increases Trader and Trade Ship movement speed by +30% and armor by +8.

sultanhani-trade-network.name: 苏丹哈尼驿站贸易网络
sultanhani-trade-network.description: Acts as a Market. Comes with 3 Traders garrisoned and generates +24 Gold per minute for each one. Up to 10 Traders can be garrisoned.

twin-minaret-medrese.name: 双子宣礼塔神学院
twin-minaret-medrese.description: Acts as a Mill. Grows 4 Berry Bushes which can be harvested +50% faster. Berry Bushes are regrown after 120 seconds if depleted.

abbey-of-the-trinity.name: 圣三一修道院
abbey-of-the-trinity.description: Acts as a Monastery. Reduces the cost of Warrior Monks by -50% and contains unique religious technologies.

cathedral-of-the-tsar.name: 沙皇大教堂
cathedral-of-the-tsar.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

fortified-palisade-gate.name: 强化木城门
fortified-palisade-gate.description: Relatively sturdy defensive gate. Must be built on a Fortified Palisade Wall segment.

fortified-palisade-wall.name: 硬木栅栏
fortified-palisade-wall.description:
Well-built defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

high-armory.name: 高级军械库
high-armory.description: Decrease the cost of siege engines in nearby Siege Workshops by -20%. Contains unique siege engine technologies.

high-trade-house.name: 高等贸易所
high-trade-house.description:
Generates Gold like a Hunting Cabin with the value increased by +400%, without claiming any trees. Spawns a Huntable Deer every 60 seconds.
Villagers can drop off Food at this building.

hunting-cabin.name: 狩猎小屋
hunting-cabin.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. It houses technologies to improve Food gathering and produces Scouts.
Generates Gold based on the number of nearby trees. Trees in overlapped areas are only counted once.

kremlin.name: 克里姆林
kremlin.description:
Acts as a Wooden Fortress that comes with Arrowslits, Castle Turret, and Castle Watch technologies.
Can Levy Militia every 80 seconds to the Capital Town Center.

spasskaya-tower.name: 斯巴斯克塔
spasskaya-tower.description:
Acts as a Keep with all weapon emplacements and increased health.
Unlocks the building of Stone Walls, Stone Gates, and Stone Wall Towers.

the-golden-gate.name: 金门
the-golden-gate.description: Allows the exchange of resources at a favorable rate. Generates an additional exchange every 50 seconds.

wooden-fortress.name: 木制要塞
wooden-fortress.description: Sturdy wooden stronghold with extensive line of sight that detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Attacks while garrisoned.

jiangnan-tower.name: 江南塔
jiangnan-tower.description:
Acts as a tax drop-off for Imperial Officials.
Receive a free unit at the tower whenever a Barracks, Archery Range, or Stable is completed. Receive a free Villager whenever a Town Center is completed.

meditation-gardens.name: 冥想花园
meditation-gardens.description:
Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. 
The more resources are nearby, the more resources are generated. Enemy units nearby disturb the peace and reduce resources generated.

mount-lu-academy.name: 白鹿洞书院
mount-lu-academy.description:
Imperial Officials collect tax twice as often and also collect 20% of taxes as Food.
Contains unique upgrades that greatly improve the Imperial Official unit.

shaolin-monastery.name: 少林寺
shaolin-monastery.description: Unique Monastery capable of producing Shaolin Monks. From the Yuan Dynasty onwards, Shaolin Monks can also be produced from Pagodas.

temple-of-the-sun.name: 孙武祠
temple-of-the-sun.description: Activate powerful abilities that improve speed, damage, range, or regeneration of specific units.

zhu-xis-library.name: 朱熹书院
zhu-xis-library.description:
Hosts a range of highly unique upgrades.
Can unlock Yuan Raiders and Imperial Guards. Only 2 technologies can be researched.

elite-archers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-archers.description: Upgrade Veteran Archers to Elite Archers.

elite-camel-archers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-camel-archers.description: Upgrade Veteran Camel Archers to Elite Camel Archers.

elite-camel-riders.name: 升级为精锐
elite-camel-riders.description: Upgrade Camel Riders to Elite Camel Riders.

elite-horsemen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-horsemen.description: Upgrade Veteran Horsemen to Elite Horsemen.

elite-knights-or-lancers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-knights-or-lancers.description: Upgrade Knights or Lancers to Elite Knights or Lancers.

elite-spearmen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-spearmen.description: Upgrade Veteran Spearmen to Elite Spearmen.

veteran-camel-archers.name: 升级为老练
veteran-camel-archers.description: Upgrade Camel Archers to Veteran Camel Archers.

veteran-spearmen.name: 升级为老练
veteran-spearmen.description: Upgrade Hardened Spearmen to Veteran Spearmen.

elite-camel-lancers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-camel-lancers.description: Upgrade Camel Lancers to Elite Camel Lancers.

elite-desert-raiders.name: 升级为精锐
elite-desert-raiders.description: Upgrade Veteran Desert Raiders to Elite Desert Raiders.

veteran-desert-raiders.name: 升级为老练
veteran-desert-raiders.description: Upgrade Desert Raiders to Veteran Desert Raiders.

elite-limitanei.name: 升级为精锐
elite-limitanei.description: Upgrade Veteran Limitanei to Elite Limitanei

elite-varangian-guard.name: 升级为精锐
elite-varangian-guard.description: Upgrade Varangian Guard to Elite Varangian Guard

veteran-limitanei.name: 升级为老练
veteran-limitanei.description: Upgrade Hardened Limitanei to Veteran Limitanei

elite-fire-lancers.name: 升级为精锐火长矛骑兵
elite-fire-lancers.description: Upgrade Fire Lancers to Elite Fire Lancers.

elite-palace-guards.name: 升级为精锐
elite-palace-guards.description: Upgrade Palace Guards to Elite Palace Guards.

elite-zhuge-nu.name: 升级为精锐
elite-zhuge-nu.description: Upgrade Veteran Zhuge Nu to Elite Zhuge Nu.

veteran-zhuge-nu.name: 升级为老练
veteran-zhuge-nu.description: Upgrade Zhuge Nu to Veteran Zhuge Nu.

elite-ghazi-raiders.name: 升级为精锐
elite-ghazi-raiders.description: Upgrade Veteran Ghazi Raiders to Elite Ghazi Raiders.

veteran-ghazi-raiders.name: 升级为老练
veteran-ghazi-raiders.description: Upgrade Ghazi Raiders to Veteran Ghazi Raiders.

early-men-at-arms.name: 升级为早期
early-men-at-arms.description: Upgrade Vanguard Men-at-Arms to Early Men-at-Arms.

elite-longbowmen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-longbowmen.description: Upgrade Veteran Longbowmen to Elite Longbowmen.

elite-royal-knights.name: 升级为精锐
elite-royal-knights.description: Upgrade Veteran Royal Knights to Elite Royal Knights.

veteran-royal-knights.name: 升级为老练
veteran-royal-knights.description: Upgrade Royal Knights to Veteran Royal Knights.

elite-mounted-samurai.name: 升级为精锐
elite-mounted-samurai.description: Upgrade Mounted Samurai to Elite Mounted Samurai.

elite-onna-bugeisha.name: 升级为精锐
elite-onna-bugeisha.description: Upgrade Veteran Onna-Bugeisha to Elite Onna-Bugeisha.

elite-samurai.name: 升级为精锐
elite-samurai.description: Upgrade Veteran Samurai to Elite Samurai.

elite-yumi-ashigaru.name: 升级为精锐
elite-yumi-ashigaru.description: Upgrade Veteran Yumi Ashigaru to Elite Yumi Ashigaru.

veteran-samurai.name: 升级为老练
veteran-samurai.description: Upgrade Hardened Samurai to Veteran Samurai.

veteran-yumi-ashigaru.name: 升级为老练
veteran-yumi-ashigaru.description: Upgrade Yumi Ashigaru to Veteran Yumi Ashigaru.

elite-donso.name: 升级为精锐
elite-donso.description: Upgrade Veteran Donso to Elite Donso.

elite-javelin-thrower.name: 升级为精锐
elite-javelin-thrower.description: Upgrades Veteran Javelin Thrower to Elite Javelin Thrower

elite-musofadi.name: 升级为精锐
elite-musofadi.description: Upgrade Veteran Musofadi to Elite Musofadi.

elite-sofa.name: 升级为精锐
elite-sofa.description: Upgrade Veteran Sofa to Elite Sofa.

elite-warrior-scout.name: 精锐战士侦察兵
elite-warrior-scout.description: Upgrade Veteran Warrior Scout to Elite Warrior Scout

veteran-donso.name: 升级为老练
veteran-donso.description: Upgrade Hardened Dosno to Veteran Donso.

veteran-javelin-thrower.name: 升级为老练
veteran-javelin-thrower.description: Upgrades Javelin Thrower to Veteran Javelin Thrower

veteran-warrior-scout.name: 老练战士侦察兵
veteran-warrior-scout.description: Upgrade Warrior Scout to Veteran Warrior Scout

elite-keshiks.name: 升级为精锐
elite-keshiks.description: Upgrade Veteran Keshiks to Elite Keshiks.

elite-mangudai.name: 升级为精锐
elite-mangudai.description: Upgrade Veteran Mangudai to Elite Mangudai.

elite-gilded-archers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-archers.description: Upgrade Veteran Gilded Archers to Elite Gilded Archers.

elite-gilded-crossbowmen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-crossbowmen.description: Upgrade Gilded Crossbowmen to Elite Gilded Crossbowmen.

elite-gilded-horsemen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-horsemen.description: Upgrade Veteran Gilded Horsemen to Elite Gilded Horsemen.

elite-gilded-knights.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-knights.description: Upgrade Gilded Knights to Elite Gilded Knights.

elite-gilded-landsknechte.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-landsknechte.description: Upgrade Gilded Landsknechte to Elite Gilded Landsknechte.

elite-gilded-men-at-arms.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-men-at-arms.description: Upgrade Gilded Men-at-Arms to Elite Gilded Men-at-Arms.

elite-gilded-spearmen.name: 升级为精锐
elite-gilded-spearmen.description: Upgrade Veteran Gilded Spearmen to Elite Gilded Spearmen.

gilded-men-at-arms.name: 升级为武士
gilded-men-at-arms.description: Upgrade Early Gilded Men-at-Arms to Gilded Men-at-Arms.

hardened-gilded-spearmen.name: 升级为坚韧
hardened-gilded-spearmen.description: Upgrade Gilded Spearmen to Hardened Gilded Spearmen.

veteran-gilded-archers.name: 升级为老练
veteran-gilded-archers.description: Upgrade Gilded Archers to Veteran Gilded Archers.

veteran-gilded-horsemen.name: 升级为老练
veteran-gilded-horsemen.description: Upgrade Gilded Horsemen to Veteran Gilded Horsemen.

veteran-gilded-spearmen.name: 升级为老练
veteran-gilded-spearmen.description: Upgrade Hardened Gilded Spearmen to Veteran Gilded Spearmen.

elite-cavalry-archer.name: 升级为精锐
elite-cavalry-archer.description: Upgrade Veteran Cavalry Archer to Elite Cavalry Archer.

elite-sipahi.name: 升级为精锐
elite-sipahi.description: Upgrade Veteran Sipahi to Elite Sipahi.

veteran-cavalry-archer.name: 升级为老练
veteran-cavalry-archer.description: Upgrade Cavalry Archer to Veteran Cavalry Archer.

elite-horse-archers.name: 升级为精锐
elite-horse-archers.description: Upgrade Horse Archers to Elite Horse Archers.

palace-guards.name: 升级为皇宫卫兵
palace-guards.description: Upgrade Early Palace Guards to Palace Guards.

ability-camel-support.name: 骆驼支援
ability-camel-support.description: Infantry gain armor when near a camel unit.

ability-camel-unease.name: 骆驼惊吓
ability-camel-unease.description: Camels cause enemy horse cavalry units to deal 20% less damage.

ability-conversion.name: 招降
ability-conversion.description:
Attempts to convert enemy units within range of this Monk to your control.
Cooldown: 120 Seconds.

ability-golden-age-tier-3.name: 黄金时代3
ability-golden-age-tier-3.description: +20% Production Speed, additional +5% Research Speed, additional +5% Resource Gathering Rate

ability-house-of-wisdom-influence.name: 智慧宫影响
ability-house-of-wisdom-influence.description:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.

ability-man-the-sails.name: 掌舵人
ability-man-the-sails.description: Activate to move 40% faster for 10 seconds, deactivates early when dealing damage.

ability-medical-centers.name: 医疗中心
ability-medical-centers.description: Heals nearby units for +2 health every 1 second

ability-proselytize.name: 传教
ability-proselytize.description: Attempts to convert a single enemy unit within range of this Imam to your control.

ability-quick-strike.name: 快速打击
ability-quick-strike.description: Quickly deals a second hit after finishing an attack.

ability-ring-the-town-bell.name: 敲钟
ability-ring-the-town-bell.description: Alerts and orders all nearby Villagers to automatically seek shelter in the nearest garrisonable building.

ability-atabeg-supervision.name: 阿塔贝格监督
ability-atabeg-supervision.description: Garrison inside of a military production building to grant +20% health to newly trained units. Cannot garrison in Docks.

ability-desert-raider-blade.name: 沙漠掠夺者之刃
ability-desert-raider-blade.description: Swap to a melee Sword weapon.

ability-desert-raider-bow.name: 沙漠掠夺者之弓
ability-desert-raider-bow.description: Swap to a ranged Bow weapon.

ability-golden-age-tier-4.name: 黄金时代4
ability-golden-age-tier-4.description: 50 Structures: Siege units cost 20% less resources to produce.

ability-mass-heal.name: 群体治疗
ability-mass-heal.description: Heals all nearby units. Heals +50% times faster when carrying a relic.

ability-structural-reinforcements.name: 结构加固
ability-structural-reinforcements.description:
Siege unit gains +20 melee armor and +5 fire armor for 10 seconds.
Costs 50 Wood to activate, only useable on one unit at a time.

ability-swap-weapon-incendiary.name: 切换武器（燃烧弹）
ability-swap-weapon-incendiary.description: Switch to incendiary ammunition, which deals damage in an increased area.

ability-swap-weapon-kinetic.name: 切换武器（固体弹）
ability-swap-weapon-kinetic.description: Switch to solid ammunition, which deals higher damage.

ability-tactical-charge.name: 战术冲锋
ability-tactical-charge.description: Camel Lancers charge faster, more often, and for longer distances than other heavy cavalry. Camel Lancers deals -25% less baseline charge damage. Each second spent charging increases the charge damage (up to +40%).

ability-akritoi-defense.name: 阿克里托伊防御
ability-akritoi-defense.description:
Arm nearby Villagers with stronger weapons and increase their armor by +2 for 30 seconds.
+1 damage in Dark Age
+1 damage in Feudal Age
+1 damage in Castle Age
+2 damage in Imperial Age

ability-artillery-shot.name: 火炮射击
ability-artillery-shot.description:
Loads this Cannon with an Artillery Shot that has an increased range of 5 tiles and 30% more damage.
Can only target buildings.

ability-automatic-pilgrim-flask.name: 自动朝圣者之瓶
ability-automatic-pilgrim-flask.description: Toggle on to activate automatic drinking when low health, rapidly increasing health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.

ability-berserking.name: 狂战士
ability-berserking.description: Varangian Guard swap to their two-handed weapon and deal +6 damage for 30 seconds. Armor is reduced by -4.

ability-border-settlement.name: 边境聚落
ability-border-settlement.description: Line of sight increased by 7 tiles.

ability-conscriptio.name: 征兵
ability-conscriptio.description: Military unit production rate increased +20%/+40%/+60%/+80%/+100% by Water Level while within the influence of a Cistern.

ability-dialecticus.name: 辩证法
ability-dialecticus.description: Research rate increased +30%/+60%/+90%/+120%/+150% by Water Level while within the influence of a Cistern.

ability-emperors-guard.name: 帝王卫兵
ability-emperors-guard.description: Armor increased by +3 while near allied Wonders.

ability-field-stones.name: 野外石料
ability-field-stones.description: Earn various amounts of Stone from every building constructed.

ability-improved-torch.name: 改良火把
ability-improved-torch.description: Torch damage improved by a nearby Scout.

ability-irrigated.name: 灌溉
ability-irrigated.description: Villager gathering rate increased by 5/10/15/20/25% (depening on water level)

ability-naval-deployment.name: 海军部署
ability-naval-deployment.description: Increased movement speed after unloading from a Transport Ship.

ability-oil-commerce.name: 橄榄油贸易
ability-oil-commerce.description: Traders provide +20% Olive Oil on trades.

ability-olive-harvest.name: 收获橄榄油
ability-olive-harvest.description: Villagers generate Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered when farming.

ability-pilgrim-flask.name: 朝圣者之瓶
ability-pilgrim-flask.description: Activate to drink, rapidly increasing health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.

ability-place-palings.name: 拒马
ability-place-palings.description: Enemy cavalry are stunned for 2.5 seconds and take 25 damage.

ability-praesidium.name: 水池 - 保护
ability-praesidium.description: Building damage taken decreased by -5%/-10%/-15%/-20%/-25% by Water Level while within the influence of a Cistern.

ability-royal-knight-charge-damage.name: 皇家骑士冲锋
ability-royal-knight-charge-damage.description: Gain +3 melee attack damage for 5 seconds after charging.

ability-shield-wall.name: 盾墙
ability-shield-wall.description: Enter a defensive stance, decreasing move speed by -25%, attack speed by -25%, and ranged damage taken by -30%.

ability-synergistic-crops.name: 协同种植
ability-synergistic-crops.description: Farmers and Foragers generate +60% Olive Oil around the Grand Winery.

ability-trample.name: 践踏
ability-trample.description: Charge through enemy units in your path, dealing 12 damage to each one.

ability-triumph.name: 凯旋
ability-triumph.description:
Consume all Supply Points to increase cavalry damage by +4, move speed by +10%, and health regeneration by +2. 
Each Supply Point increases Triumph's duration by 1 seconds. A maximum of 45 Supply Points can be collected.

ability-varangian-berserking.name: 瓦兰吉狂战士
ability-varangian-berserking.description: Damage increased by +6 and armor decreased by -4.

ability-extra-materials.name: 额外材料
ability-extra-materials.description: Towers and Keeps repair nearby walls and gates for +20 health per second.

ability-imperial-spies.name: 帝国间谍
ability-imperial-spies.description: Reveal location of enemy workers for 15 seconds.

ability-spirit-way.name: 先祖皇陵
ability-spirit-way.description: When a dynasty unit is killed, nearby units receive +20% attack speed and +20 health over 10 seconds.

ability-the-long-wall.name: 长城
ability-the-long-wall.description: All units standing on Walls gain +25% ranged damage.

ability-forced-march.name: 急行军
ability-forced-march.description: Activate to move 100% faster for 10 seconds, deactivates early when dealing damage.

ability-tower-of-victory-aura.name: 胜利之塔光环
ability-tower-of-victory-aura.description: Melee and ranged infantry who move near this Landmark permanently gain +20% attack speed.

ability-abbey-healing.name: 修道院治疗
ability-abbey-healing.description: Heals nearby out of combat units by 6 every 1 seconds.

ability-arrow-volley.name: 万箭齐发
ability-arrow-volley.description: Reduce Longbowman's time to attack by +1 second for a duration of 6 seconds.

ability-mill-influence.name: 磨坊光环
ability-mill-influence.description: Farm harvest rate increased +15%/+20%/+25%/+30% by Age while within the influence of a Mill.

ability-network-of-castles.name: 城堡网络
ability-network-of-castles.description: When enemies are nearby, this building sounds an alarm, causing nearby units to get a +20% increase to attack speed.

ability-network-of-citadels.name: 城堡网络
ability-network-of-citadels.description: When enemies are nearby, this building sounds an alarm, causing nearby units to get a +40% increase to attack speed.

ability-setup-camp.name: 预备营地
ability-setup-camp.description:
Place a Campfire which increases sight range of nearby units by 30%.
A maximum of 5 Campfires can be lit at any one time. Placing an additional Campfire extinguishes an older one.

ability-deploy-pavise.name: 部署大盾
ability-deploy-pavise.description:
Activate to increase weapon range by +1 tile and gain +5 ranged armor.
Remains active for 30 seconds or until the Arbalétrier moves away.

ability-royal-institute-influence.name: 皇家学院
ability-royal-institute-influence.description: Archery Ranges and Stables within influence have unit costs decreased by 20%.

ability-town-center-production-speed-cas.name: 城堡时代城镇中心生产速度
ability-town-center-production-speed-cas.description: Town Center production and research speed increased by 20%.

ability-town-center-production-speed-dar.name: 黑暗时代城镇中心生产速度
ability-town-center-production-speed-dar.description:
Town Center production and research speed increased by +10%.
Bonus increases further in later Ages.

ability-town-center-production-speed-feu.name: 封建时代城镇中心生产速度
ability-town-center-production-speed-feu.description:
Town Center production and research speed increased by +15%.
Bonus increases further in later Ages.

ability-emergency-repairs.name: 紧急维修
ability-emergency-repairs.description: Building repairs itself by 150 health every 1 second for 20 seconds.

ability-inspired-warriors.name: 战意激昂
ability-inspired-warriors.description: Military units deal +15% damage and gain +1 armor.

ability-relic-garrisoned-dock.name: 在码头放置圣物
ability-relic-garrisoned-dock.description: Increasing attack speed of military ships by +5%.

ability-relic-garrisoned-keep.name: 在防御建筑放置圣物
ability-relic-garrisoned-keep.description:
• Armor increased by +25%
• Damage increased by +25%
• Sight range increased by +20%
• Weapon range increased by +20%

ability-deflective-armor.name: 偏转护甲
ability-deflective-armor.description: Deflective Armor charge can block one melee or ranged attack. Recharges while out of combat for 8 seconds.

ability-five-mountain-ministries.name: 五项山地事工
ability-five-mountain-ministries.description: Every 6 seconds, applies Sohei Sutra to the closest enemy. Sohei Sutra reduces the enemies damage by 50% for 60 seconds.

ability-kabura-ya.name: 鸣镝箭
ability-kabura-ya.description: Onna-Musha fire a whistling arrow when an enemy is seen, increasing move speed for 10 seconds.

ability-katana-bannerman-aura.name: 刀剑旗本武士光环
ability-katana-bannerman-aura.description:
Aura that increases melee infantry damage by +15%.
Banner drops on death and lasts for 30 seconds providing the same aura.

ability-place-yorishiro.name: 放置依代
ability-place-yorishiro.description:
Place a Yorishiro in the following buildings to receive bonuses and increase their line of sight.
Military and Docks: +150% Production speed
Town Center: +30% Production speed
Farmhouse: +75 Food per minute
Lumber Camp: +75 Wood per minute
Forge: +60 Gold per minute
Wonder: +4000 Health

ability-sabotage.name: 破坏
ability-sabotage.description: Target a visible enemy building to deal 200 damage, disable its production, and set it on fire for 30 seconds.

ability-shunshin.name: 瞬身
ability-shunshin.description: Drop a smoke bomb and reappear at a selected location.

ability-soheis-sutra.name: 僧兵箴言
ability-soheis-sutra.description: Reduces enemy damage by 50% for 60 seconds.

ability-spy.name: 间谍
ability-spy.description: Target a visible enemy unit or structure to disguise the Shinobi as a Villager of that player.

ability-treasure-caravans.name: 宝藏商队
ability-treasure-caravans.description: Select a neutral Trade Post to periodically spawn Treasure Caravans from that location. Caravans can convert into a Trade Ship when instructed to reach Trade Posts over water.

ability-uma-bannerman-aura.name: 骑马旗本武士光环
ability-uma-bannerman-aura.description:
Aura that increases cavalry unit damage by +15%.
Banner drops on death and lasts for 30 seconds providing the same aura.

ability-yumi-bannerman-aura.name: 弓箭旗本武士光环
ability-yumi-bannerman-aura.description:
Aura that increases ranged infantry damage by +15%.
Banner drops on death and lasts for 30 seconds providing the same aura.

ability-bring-down-the-walls.name: 推倒城墙！
ability-bring-down-the-walls.description: Jeanne calls a Cannon to her side. Rallies an additional Cannon if used on a Neutral Settlement.

ability-consecrate.name: 圣化
ability-consecrate.description:
Jeanne consecrates a production building, reducing the Food cost of units by -25%.
No Cooldown
Recharge Time: 120 Seconds.
Max Charges: 4.

ability-divine-arrow.name: 神圣之弓
ability-divine-arrow.description:
Jeanne targets an enemy and fires a divine arrow that deals 40 damage.
Cooldown: 8 Seconds.
Recharge Time: 60 Seconds.
Max Charges: 4

ability-divine-restoration.name: 神圣恢复
ability-divine-restoration.description:
Jeanne and nearby allies are blessed, instantly healing for 30% of their missing health.
Cooldown: 120 Seconds.

ability-forward-companions.name: 前进，伙伴们！
ability-forward-companions.description: Jeanne calls 3/6 Knights to her side. Rallies 2 additional Knights if used on a Neutral Settlement.

ability-galvanize-the-righteous.name: 鼓舞士气
ability-galvanize-the-righteous.description: Companions close to Jeanne gain +1/1 armor and +10% damage.

ability-holy-wrath.name: 神圣愤怒
ability-holy-wrath.description:
Jeanne unleashes a powerful area of effect attack, striking all enemies within 1.25 tiles for 20 damage.
Cooldown: 8 Seconds.
Recharge Time: 60 Seconds.
Max Charges: 4.

ability-honorable-heart.name: 荣耀之心
ability-honorable-heart.description:
Jeanne regenerates 1/1.5/2/2.5 health per second while out of combat based on her current level.
At level 3 Jeanne takes 45% less damage from ranged attacks; at level 4 this is increased to 60%.

ability-jeannes-companions.name: 贞德的伙伴
ability-jeannes-companions.description: Achieve level 3 with Jeanne d'Arc to select between Champions and Riders to be trained at the keep.

ability-journey-of-a-hero.name: 英雄之旅
ability-journey-of-a-hero.description:
Jeanne generates experience for completing tasks such as gathering resources, constructing buildings, hunting boar, capturing Sacred Sites, and participating in combat. Jeanne also gains a small trickle of experience over time.
After earning sufficient experience Jeanne can level up, becoming more powerful and gaining access to unique abilities.

ability-merchant-guilds.name: 商人公会
ability-merchant-guilds.description: Active Traders generate 1 gold every 6 seconds.

ability-nock-your-arrows.name: 搭箭！
ability-nock-your-arrows.description: Jeanne calls 2/4/6 Archers to her side. Rallies 2 additional Archers if used on a Neutral Settlement.

ability-return-of-the-saint.name: 圣人回归
ability-return-of-the-saint.description: Pay tribute and instantly return Jeanne to the battlefield.

ability-riders-ready.name: 骑兵就绪！
ability-riders-ready.description:
Jeanne calls 3 Riders to her side.
Cooldown: 240 Seconds.

ability-spears-up.name: 架矛！
ability-spears-up.description: Jeanne calls 2 Spearmen to her side. Awards 50 experience if activated on a Neutral Settlement or a friendly Keep or Landmark.

ability-strength-of-heaven.name: 天堂之力
ability-strength-of-heaven.description:
Jeanne chooses a unit to bless, bestowing them with incredible strength and durability. The chosen warrior gains 300 health, 4 Melee and Ranged Armor, and +300% damage.
Jeanne may only bless one unit at a time.
Cooldown: 30 Seconds.

ability-talented-builder.name: 建筑天才
ability-talented-builder.description:
Jeanne constructs buildings 33% faster.
Upon reaching level 2, Jeanne shares her talents with nearby builders.

ability-to-arms-men.name: 伙计们，拿起武器！
ability-to-arms-men.description:
Jeanne calls 3 Champions to her side.
Cooldown: 240 Seconds.

ability-valorous-inspiration.name: 勇气鼓舞
ability-valorous-inspiration.description:
Increases the attack speed of all units within 4 tiles by 35% for 20 seconds.
Cooldown: 60 Seconds.

ability-activate-stealth.name: 潜行
ability-activate-stealth.description:
Enter Stealth for 30 seconds.
While in Stealth, units are invisible until they are revealed by enemy Scouts, Outposts, Landmark Town Centers, or they engage in combat.

ability-coastal-navigation.name: 沿海航行
ability-coastal-navigation.description: Ships near a Docks get +15% speed for 25 seconds.

ability-first-strike.name: 先发制人
ability-first-strike.description: Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners deal double damage on their first attack when breaking stealth.

ability-food-festival.name: 食物节庆
ability-food-festival.description: Increase Food gather rate by +50% for 90 seconds.

ability-huntress-stealth.name: 女猎手的潜行
ability-huntress-stealth.description: Malian infantry within range enter Stealth. While in Stealth, units are invisible until they are revealed by enemy Scouts, Outposts, or when they engage in combat.

ability-military-festival.name: 军事节庆
ability-military-festival.description: Increase all unit production speed by +100% for 90 seconds.

ability-siege-festival.name: 攻城节庆
ability-siege-festival.description:
Increase damage of Battering Rams, Bombards, Counterweight Trebuchets, and torches by +50% for 90 seconds.
Applies to Springald Ships once Mounted Guns has been researched.

ability-attack-speed-arrow.name: 速箭
ability-attack-speed-arrow.description: Fires a Signal Arrow that increases the attack speed of nearby ranged units (including the Khan) by +50% for 5 seconds.

ability-defense-arrow.name: 防御箭
ability-defense-arrow.description: Fires a Signal Arrow that increases the armor of nearby units (including the Khan) by +2 for 5 seconds.

ability-kurultai-aura.name: 忽里勒台光环
ability-kurultai-aura.description: Nearby units within its aura heal +1 health every 1 second and gain an additional +20% damage.

ability-maneuver-arrow.name: 机动箭
ability-maneuver-arrow.description: Fire a Signal Arrow that increases the movement speed of nearby units (including the Khan) by +33% for 5 seconds. Does not affect Villagers.

ability-ovoo-influence.name: 敖包光环
ability-ovoo-influence.description: Buildings within influence have access to double production and improved technology. Pastures within influence produce Sheep at a faster rate.

ability-silk-road.name: 丝绸之路
ability-silk-road.description:
The types of resources you earn from each Trader is improved based on your total number of active Traders.
5+ Traders: +10% Food
10+ Traders: +10% Food, +10% Wood

ability-yam.name: 驿站
ability-yam.description: Cavalry and Traders near an Outpost get +15% speed for 10 seconds.

ability-yam-network-improved.name: 驿站网络(已强化)
ability-yam-network-improved.description: Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.

ability-attack-drums.name: 攻击战鼓
ability-attack-drums.description: Mehter drums that increase the attack speed of nearby units by +15%.

ability-blacksmith-and-university-influe.name: 铁匠铺和大学光环
ability-blacksmith-and-university-influe.description: Military unit production rate increased +20%/+30%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +100%.

ability-fortitude.name: 坚毅
ability-fortitude.description: Gain +50% attack speed and receive +50% damage from melee weapons for 10 seconds.

ability-mehter-speed-bonus.name: 军乐队移速光环
ability-mehter-speed-bonus.description: Units move +15% faster when in formation.

ability-melee-defense-drums.name: 近战防御鼓
ability-melee-defense-drums.description: Mehter drums that increase the melee armor of nearby units by +2.

ability-ranged-defense-drums.name: 远程防御鼓
ability-ranged-defense-drums.description: Mehter drums that increase the ranged armor of nearby units by +1.

ability-trade-protection.name: 贸易保护
ability-trade-protection.description: Traders and Trade Ships near Keeps receive +30% move speed and +8 armor for 20 seconds.

ability-gallop.name: 疾驰
ability-gallop.description: Activate to move at maximum speed with +2 tile weapon range for 8 seconds.

ability-high-armory-production-bonus.name: 高军械库生产加成
ability-high-armory-production-bonus.description: The cost of siege engines in nearby Siege Workshops is decreased by 20%.

ability-saints-blessing.name: 圣者的祝福
ability-saints-blessing.description: After striking an enemy, the Warrior Monk increases the armor and damage of nearby allied Rus military units for a duration.

ability-static-deployment.name: 静态部署
ability-static-deployment.description: Streltsy gain +30% attack speed after remaining stationary for 10 seconds.

ability-ascetic-recovery.name: 苦行恢复
ability-ascetic-recovery.description: The Shaolin Monk regains health when out of combat.

ability-body-of-iron.name: 钢铁之躯
ability-body-of-iron.description: The Shaolin Monk hardens his body and reduces incoming ranged damage by 50% for 15 seconds.

ability-bounty-of-solitude.name: 孤独的恩惠
ability-bounty-of-solitude.description: Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. Enemy units within 8 tiles reduce the rate at which resources are generated.

ability-divine-defense.name: 其徐如林
ability-divine-defense.description: Gunpowder units and defensive structures gain +1 range.

ability-divine-vitality.name: 不动如山

ability-supervise.name: 监督

俄国不再通过杀羊获得赏金

修复了斯特雷尔齐在被投弹兵攻击时切换到近战武器的问题
成本从150食物、350黄金更改为150木材、350黄金
训练时间从45秒减少到35秒
建造时间从3秒增加到7秒

成本设定为75食物、175黄金，研究时间设定为20秒
新技术‘装载炮’，用大炮替换春风船的弩炮，增加了射程和伤害
成本设定为200木材、500黄金，研究时间设定为45秒

弓箭船的标枪爆发次数从3减少到2
弓箭船的标枪伤害从6减少到4
新技术‘装载炮’，用大炮替换春风船的弩炮，增加了射程和伤害
成本设定为200木材、500黄金，研究时间设定为45秒
修复了马里贸易税机制中的一个漏洞
修复了一个错误，导致毒箭在法林巴驻军处升级弓箭手时停止工作
修复了一个错误，导致唐索在投矛冷却时播放循环攻击动画
生命恢复速度从每秒5减少到1
减少建筑和单位的侦测半径，以便在隐身状态下看到穆索法迪。哨所和侦察兵保持不变，继续作为预期的反制手段。
奥斯曼的起始木材从150增加到200
核心军事和科技建筑便宜33%
新技术‘帝国舰队’，使大帆船和卡拉克的训练和移动速度提高15%

扬尼斯兵的建造时间从28秒减少到24秒

奥斯曼大舰现在可以发射三种武器，而不仅仅是一种

码头建筑现在可以重新指定目标到其他海军单位。
牛的成本从100减少到75黄金。
盟友玩家的采集速度从0.9减少到0.66。

黄金采集速度从30增加到35。
修正了马里运输船在驻守时投掷标枪的能力缺失于文明科技树和奖励的问题。
修正了马里市场在购买和出售资源时的惩罚减少的问题。
修正了沙漠贸易网络地标上缺少防御武器升级的问题。
修正了军事与科技成本减少奖励缺失于科技树的问题。
梅赫特单位在某些条件下不再错误地应用多个增益。
修正了梅赫特的攻击鼓给出的攻击速度超过预期的问题。
修正了西帕希单位的坚韧能力在梅赫特单位的攻击鼓光环内无法正确激活的问题。

罗斯战士僧侣在施展转化时不再被其他单位推开。
成本从15石头增加到20石头。
修正了防御工事建造速度未能正确提高50%的问题。
建造时间从8秒增加到10.5秒。
建造时间从2秒增加到2.5秒。
建造时间从1分钟45秒增加到2分钟。
建造时间从45秒减少到40秒。
宋朝村民生产速度从13秒改为15秒（33%的减少奖励，而不是35%）。

羊的生成时间从120秒增加到140秒。

sections.subtitle: 所有文明的游戏玩法变更

知识的保存研究时间从60秒减少到30秒

在激活时，苏丹宫每200秒将训练一头象。

不再生产塔象或战争象。

现在为受影响的单位增加金色光环。

象牙攻城伤害对建筑物增加+100。

一次只能训练一位国王。
每秒为附近未参与战斗的单位恢复2点生命值。

现在训练2名长矛兵、2名弩手和1台投石机，而不是1名长矛兵、1名重装步兵、1名骑士、1名长弓手和1台投石机。
成本和训练时间保持不变，仍为100食物、100木材、200黄金和75秒。

仍然训练3名骑兵和3名骑士。

训练时间从60秒减少到50秒。

6名翼卫步兵的成本为200食物、500黄金，训练时间为60秒。

修复了双击时同时选择Wynguard步兵和武装民兵的错误。

修复了在附近磨坊被摧毁后，英语农场影响仍然存在的错误。
将城堡网络的值从20%减少到15%。
将要塞网络的值从40%减少到30%。

现在在所有城堡和市政中心激活弩兵武器。

新的独特科技，使骑士获得+2护甲。

不再影响海军箭孔技术，现在适用于沸油技术。

对未装甲目标的每秒伤害应保持相对不变
Siha弓肢的技术要求从城堡时代提高到帝国时代。
可汗信号箭的射程从25增加到35。
哨箭的成本从100食物250黄金减少到50食物125黄金。
改进的哨箭的成本从350石头减少到175石头。

修复了黑暗时代长矛手的火把伤害为12而不是预期的10的错误。

帝国舰队海军技术生产速度和移动速度对火药船的加成从15%提高到25%。
克里姆林宫现在可以向地标城镇中心征召民兵。民兵是一种快速且轻装甲的单位，生命周期为90秒。
征召民兵需要1个'补给'才能使用，并生成2个民兵。克里姆林宫每60秒自动免费获得+1补给。
成本从100减少到40食物（来自PUP的变化）。
生成的单位从6个减少到2个民兵（来自PUP的变化）。
圣者的影响从+3范围增加到+5范围，激活战士僧侣的祝福。
圣者的影响和改进祝福合并为一个科技，重命名为'热情'：将圣者的祝福范围提高+5格，并将伤害提高+1
新科技：'圣者的尊崇'，增加战士僧侣的生命值+100，成本425黄金，在帝国时代可用。
鹿的生成时间从45秒恢复到60秒（最初在PUP中计划的变化）。
高兵器库中的各种科技已更新，而附近工作坊的基础效果保持不变。
效果从+20%轰炸机攻击速度更改为+20%轰炸机伤害。
现在对步兵的轰炸机增加60点额外伤害。
科技成本从150木材和350黄金增加到200木材和500黄金。
瞬时打包/拆包的效果现在也适用于轰炸机。
仍然适用于投石机和攻城车。
效果从+100%伤害减少到+50%伤害。
现在在战斗中也为攻城车提供每秒2点治疗。
修复了一个错误，该错误导致建造此地标时免费获得攻城队训练升级。
修正了帮助文本中提到的不正确箭孔武器范围和安置要求的问题。
成本从500黄金，200食物减少到250黄金，100食物。
研究时间从90秒减少到60秒。
对骑兵的生命值加成从+20增加到+30。
祝福持续时间科技重命名为神圣之光。
修正了静态部署能力的问题，该能力在移动时可能会短暂触发。
成本从 500 木材 250 黄金减少到 400 木材 150 黄金
对建筑的额外伤害从 450 减少到 375。
建造时间从 35 秒减少到 30 秒
成本从 400 木材 150 黄金减少到 300 木材 100 黄金
对建筑的额外伤害从 250 减少到 200
建造时间从 35 秒减少到 30 秒
炮台升级成本从 75 黄金 300 石头增加到 125 黄金 375 石头
贸易翼现在根据选择的时代提供 3（封建）、4（城堡）或 5（帝国）名商人
军事翼现在在封建时代提供另一名弓箭手，总计 2 名长矛兵和 2 名弓箭手
知识保存成本从 50 木材 125 黄金减少到 25 木材 75 黄金
修复了一个错误，导致中国的栅栏墙建造速度比其他文明慢 50%。
防御者地标对建筑和设施的石头折扣从 25% 减少到 20%
研究时间从 5 分钟增加到 6 分钟
当使用寻求庇护作为德里苏丹国时，村民在研究强化基础技术之前将不再在房屋旁闲站。
渔船不再通过军事选择热键进行选择。
成本从 75 石头 200 黄金增加到 150 石头 350 黄金
卫兵步兵现在正确地受到“对重型”攻击类型的额外伤害。
皇家骑士现在在冲锋后的第一次攻击中正确地造成伤害。
训练时间从 30 秒减少到 26 秒
马里时代升级快捷键现在正常工作。
丝绸之路资源奖励商人数量要求从 3/5/7/9 更改为 5/10/15/20
库尔塔伊地标的额外伤害从 25% 减少到 20%
铁匠和大学的生产影响奖励从 25/33/40% 减少到 20/30/40%
商人的移动速度奖励从 40% 减少到 30%
商人的护甲奖励从 10 减少到 8
奥斯曼骑士的名称已更改为长枪骑士。

sections.subtitle: 所有文明的游戏玩法变更

侦察员在玩家升级时不再获得额外的视野范围。
间谍镜为阿巴斯王朝、中国、德里苏丹国和马里人提供了独特的可重新映射热键，因为他们有独特的马厩。

所有防御建筑的攻击半径在被选中时现在对任何玩家可见。
僧侣现在可以在巡逻时治疗附近的任何受伤友军单位。
治疗和激励能力现在可以从指挥卡中排队。
成本从200食物/500黄金减少到150食物/350黄金。

箭船现在正确地瞄准敌方船只的中心，这改善了箭矢的视觉效果，并更好地传达了它们何时命中或未命中。
春戈船现在正确地瞄准并攻击附近的敌方单位。
春戈船对建筑物的额外伤害从45增加到55。

这个可怕的战士拥有强大的双重攻击，可以轻易击穿无甲单位，但对敌方骑士和重装步兵的效果较差。
快速连续进行两次攻击。
攻击速度从1.38改为1.13（完整双重攻击为1.63）。
成本从100食物/20黄金增加到120食物/30黄金。
训练时间从22.5秒增加到26秒。

修复了前哨阵地受到影响的问题。
成本从180食物/60黄金更改为160食物/30黄金/30木材。
移除了骆驼弓箭手的长射击延迟。
骆驼骑士盾牌和骆驼骑士铠甲技术现在为等级升级，并在马厩中共享相同的用户界面插槽。
成本从100食物/250黄金减少到75食物/200黄金。
研究时间从60秒减少到45秒。
成本从100木材/150黄金减少到75木材/125黄金。
从城堡时代移至封建时代。
研究时间从30秒减少到20秒。
现在为军事船只增加+10%生命值，而不是+10%移动速度。

拥有传教士升级的伊玛目将不再尝试转换已经被转换的敌人。
可重复使用的桶重新设计为额外的桶。
不再减少蜜蜂巢的成本。
蜜蜂巢每轮发射额外+1个火箭箭矢。
成本从150木材/350黄金增加到200木材/500黄金。
帝国宫殿和精神之路地标现在为税收投放地点。
成本从20食物/30黄金/30木材调整为30食物/20黄金/30木材。
伤害类型从远程更改为攻城（无视护甲）。
对建筑物的额外伤害从65减少到20。
修正了重新装填演练显示不正确值的问题。
成本从100食物/20黄金增加到100食物/25黄金。
成本从100食物/20木材增加到110食物/30木材。
对重型单位获得+2/3/4的额外伤害。
训练时间从22.5秒增加到25秒。
帮助文本现在澄清技术绕过时代要求。
帮助文本更新为反映该地标作为清真寺的作用。
文明描述现在说明其渔船的+50%额外生命值。
大象不再受到码头设施箭矢的攻击。
更新大象的目标优先级，以优先选择单位而非建筑物。
攻城象武器被移除，现在使用其近战象攻击建筑。
攻城象武器被移除，现在使用其近战象攻击建筑。
修正了塔象骑兵跳过燃烧箭类别的问题。
为受到热情影响的单位添加了用户界面增益图标。
学者在循环选择建筑时将不再被优先选择。
神圣科技的黄金收入奖励从50%减少到25%。
长弓手的扎营能力被移除

最多可以同时部署5个篝火。
篝火现在为该区域内的单位提供+30%的视野范围增加。如果附近没有单位，还会提供一些自然视野范围。
加冕国王的费用从150食物/150黄金减少到100食物/100黄金。

修复了国王气场半径的错误，使其与预期大小匹配。
先锋重装步兵的近战护甲从3减少到2。
村民的狩猎弓射程从2.875格增加到5格。
费用从100食物/250黄金增加到150食物/350黄金。
现在具有帝国时代单位的正确火把伤害。
费用从120食物/200木材/30黄金减少到85食物/200木材/30黄金。
新科技：'商会'在帝国时代可用。
活跃的商人每6秒生成1黄金。
受法国经济科技折扣影响。
也可以在皇家学院地标进行研究。
火药船的伤害加成从+10%增加到+15%。
费用从150木材/350黄金增加到200木材/500黄金。
现在也可以在皇家学院地标进行研究。
在部署护盾时增加+1射程。
修复了激活后移动忽略技能冷却的错误。
护盾现在可以在石墙上激活。
现在增加炮兵学院单位的生产速度。
修正了Keep的法语影响奖金帮助文本值，从25%改为20%。
祝福已从游戏中移除并合并到虔诚度中。
现在提供+10%的资源采集和+25%的建筑速度，而不仅仅是+15%的建筑速度。
修正了伟大的弗伦斯堡奇观在施瓦比亚地标影响下无法使用紧急修复的问题。
当码头被摧毁时，遗物现在会被弹出。
现在正确拥有5点火焰护甲。
持续隐身光环从10秒增加到30秒。
弓箭手、Donso和Musofadi战士的训练时间从22秒增加到24秒。
投矛手的训练时间从33秒增加到37秒。
Musofadi枪手的训练时间从52秒增加到57秒。
节日持续时间从30秒增加到60秒。

在封建时代和城堡时代，生命恢复从2.0减少到1.5。
在帝国时代，生命恢复从2.0增加到2.5。
在封建时代，移动速度从1.88减少到1.75。
老兵升级现在在城堡时代提供对远程单位的+100%额外伤害。
村民的牛收集速度从每秒0.9减少到0.81食物。
食物收集技术现在适用于驻扎在牧场中的牛的被动收入。
修复了一个错误，确保牛口数量有一个显示，告知玩家用户可以拥有的牛的数量有限。
成本从100木材/250黄金减少到50木材/125黄金。
研究时间从30秒减少到20秒。
效果从+100%减少到+50%的修复速度。
研究时间从60秒减少到30秒。
成本从100食物/250黄金增加到150食物/350黄金。
修正了一个问题，导致在研究毒箭后用户界面会被隐藏。
更新了文明奖金文本，以包括老兵单位技术的研究时间减少一半。
修正了一个问题，导致二级城镇中心、攻城塔和攻城车在科技树中缺失。
成本从140食物/100黄金减少到120食物/80黄金。
每次攻击时恢复3点生命值。
训练时间从35秒减少到30秒。
新的草原骑兵技术在帝国时代可用。
+1 每次攻击恢复的生命值。
新的改进草原骑兵技术在帝国时代可用。
+2 每次攻击恢复的生命值。
新的改进的雅姆网络技术在帝国时代可用。
在雅姆光环内每2秒恢复交易者1点生命值。
修正了库尔台无法治疗盟友单位的问题。
折扣和生产速度加成从50%减少到40%。
可汗的武器对鹿/狼/野猪获得+1的额外伤害。
侦查猎鹰技能现在可以在玩家光标位置的范围内召唤。
冷却时间从75秒减少到60秒。
现在可以看到树木的顶部。
成本从100食物/250黄金减少到50食物/125黄金。
研究时间从30秒减少到20秒。
成本从150食物/350黄金增加到300食物/700黄金。
研究时间从60秒增加到90秒。
成本从500石头增加到1000石头。
在Ovoo和白色佛塔地标中添加了宫廷建筑师技术。
帐篷、草原防御工事和牧场的打包时间从5秒减少到1秒。
修复了一个错误，打包建筑物的修复速度与攻城武器相同。现在它们将以与其他建筑物相同的速度进行修复。
修复了一个错误，打包建筑物的最小地图图标过大。
新增的蒙古骑兵图标帮助玩家区分游戏中的蒙古骑射手与其他骑射手。
修复了一个错误，轻型杂货船没有播放死亡动画。
通过更正过时的帮助文本和数值修复了军事学院的工具提示。
修复了一个问题，蒙古AI在比赛开始时可以收集木材过长时间。
修复了蒙古AI的打包建筑在重新定位时未能再次解包的问题。
调整了初始浆果生成时间，从每20秒生成一次调整为每35秒生成一次。重生时间保持在120秒。
成本从110食物/20木材增加到120食物/40木材。
新的伟大轰炸炮位置取代了堡垒上的炮台。
100远程伤害，具有更大的范围效果，+200对建筑的额外伤害，+100对船只的额外伤害。
现在具有火药单位标签，以更清楚地传达适用于它的升级。
现在在升级为军事学院后，试图向玩家移动以驻守单位。
修复了一个错误，导致选择所有军事船只时未选择大画舫。
治疗光环现在根据时代每秒恢复1/1/2/3生命值。
现在从国会城镇中心额外生成2个扬尼斯兵，除了军事学校的扬尼斯兵。
现在也适用于苏丹哈尼贸易网络生成的黄金。
修复了奥斯曼贸易袋帝国委员会技术中的要求文本，以引用正确的等级。
生命值现在根据时代变化，而不是固定的180，现在是160/180/200。
更改了梅赫特尔鼓能力的切换文本，以正确引用切换状态。
运输路线（+10%交易者和运输船移动速度文明加成）现在也适用于渔船。
修正了一个问题，导致时代II城镇中心、攻城塔和攻城锤在科技树中缺失。
修正了一个问题，导致攻城工坊显示错误的费用。
建造速度从40秒减少到25秒。
重叠光环的狩猎小屋不再受到黄金收入的惩罚。相反，树木由狩猎小屋占有。这意味着在多个狩猎小屋光环中的一棵树只会为第一个放置的小屋生成黄金。
黄金生成现在固定为30秒间隔。与赏金机制不同，等级现在在每个等级提供对狩猎小屋黄金收入的百分比增加：10%/25%/65%。
全球收入在0级赏金时上限为300金币/分钟。3级赏金时，所有狩猎小屋的收入上限为500金币/分钟。
狩猎小屋现在在建造时在其用户界面中显示树木计数器。
当小屋生成黄金时，黄金提示文本现在可见。
使用递减收益公式调整黄金生成速率，以平衡在森林密集的地图上的文明。
高贸易屋不贡献于狩猎小屋的黄金生成上限。此外，它不占有树木或需要未占有的树木以从附近的树木生成黄金。
骑士军刀重新设计为骑士斧。骑士的武器从军刀换成斧。这纯粹是视觉上的变化，仍然为近战攻击增加+4伤害。
马弓手的骑乘精准重新设计为一种名为骑乘训练的新技术。解锁奔跑能力，使马弓手在8秒内以最大移动速度移动，并增加+2武器范围。
当单位与斯特雷尔齐进行近战时会发生此情况。
不再拥有双倍时间能力。
完成后不再获得票据，第一个票据的获得发生在1分钟后。
添加了一项新能力，当激活时，会召唤所有可用的民兵到地标城镇中心。
无法在敌方地标城镇中心8个瓷砖内建造。
洛迪亚船只不再通过将低人口成本的船只转换为高人口船只来超过人口上限。
成本从100石头减少到50石头。
研究时间从30秒减少到15秒。

sections.subtitle: 所有文明的平衡与游戏玩法变化

diff: 僧侣在攻击移动治疗时不再结巴。
巡逻的僧侣在巡逻时不再治疗。
火炮位置的射程从10减少到9.5。
沸油的伤害区域从2.5×1.5的矩形改为半径为1的圆形。
轰炸机的移动速度从0.62增加到0.75。
村民不再使用弓箭攻击野猪，他们现在总是使用长矛。
